note.p: Irish shopkeeper. Of Church Street, Tullamore, King's County (County Offaly), Ireland. Interested in geology and archaeology, corresponding with the Geological Society of Dublin in 1860 and presenting items to the Royal Historical and Archaeological Society of Ireland in the 1870s.
Ireland, civil registration deaths index, 1864–1958 (Ancestry.com, accessed 3 January 2018)
Ireland, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1922 (www.willcalendars.nationalarchives.ie, accessed 3 January 2018)
Journal of the Royal Historical and Archaeological Society of Ireland 4th ser. 2 (1873): 252
'Letter from Mr. Thomas Stanley on the faults sometimes found in the drift gravel of Ireland', Dublin Quarterly Journal of Science 1 (1861): 123–4
